title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 167: Featuring Ray Ferraro
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys talk all things NHL playoffs so they are joined by one of the best in the business, Ray Ferraro, to get his take on everything that has been going on. The guys discuss the Kardi-DeBrusk situation, Cale Makar signing in Colorado, Carolina, Tampa-Columbus and a whole bunch more. The guys also get into the Masters and break down how big of a comeback story Tiger Woods has been.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
